oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Zeolite assisted dehydration of terpenic alcohols: Convenient synthesis of 1,3-dienes and oxepane
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: REDDY, PV
BHAT, SV
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: catalysis
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Terpenic alcohols undergo facile dehydration over H-ZSM-5 to yield 13-dienes, such as farnesenes, ocimene, myrcene and isoprene. Studies on homoallylic alcohol (le) gave oxepane (2e).
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: JOURNAL OF THE INDIAN CHEMICAL SOCIETY, 75(10-12), 688-689
